data.persona: I spend most of my time praying and givings sermons. I live in the local church. I am educated and dutifully serve my post.
data.description:
You are in the Library.
The library is a humongous cavernous room full of floor to ceiling shelves. Each shelf is stocked full of every type of book imaginable, most in impeccable condition. Near all of the shelves, there are types of reading nooks with benches or chaises for people to relax and read. There are some tables and chairs for study in one half of the room. There is a large fireplace in the center and some comfortable lounge chairs arranged around it for socializing. On the sparse wall space there are tapestries. Some small end tables hold huge vases of pink flowers.
There's a Tapestry, an end table, a vase, a chaises, a shelf, a table, a flower, a bench, a window, and a chair here.
The person and the maid are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a robe and a rope belt.

data.short_motivation: I need to punish this person for disrespecting my religion.
data.mid_motivation: I need to show that disrespect towards my religion will not be tolerated, so that others will respect it and perhaps even learn to follow it.
data.long_motivation: I would like to show everyone that my religion is beneficial and convert as many people as possible to follow the religion, as I am loyally devoted to it.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: go person who is speaking blasphemously
